DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether acceptance commitment therapy effective treatment SSRIs-resistant obsessive- compulsive disorder .
DOC.brief_title: Acceptance Commitment Therapy SSRI-Resistant Obsessive Compulsive Disorder
DOC.detailed_description: The patient SSRI-resistant randomized ACT , aripiprazole , SMT . Independent evaluator , blind treatment , evaluate patient study.The Yale-Brown Obsessive Compulsive Scale ( YBOCS ) use measure OCD severity .
DOC.criteria: 1. age 18 65 ; 2. less 9 year education ; 3. DSMIV diagnosis OCD 4. moderately symptomatic ( YaleBrown Obsessive Compulsive Scale score≥16 ) 5. receive least two kind SSRIs optimal dose 12 week An optimal dose describe follow : clomipramine hydrochloride , least 225 mg/d ; fluoxetine , least 60 mg/d ; paroxetine hydrochloride , least 60 mg/d ; sertraline hydrochloride , least 200 mg/d ; fluvoxamine , least 250 mg/d ; citalopram hydrobromide , least 60 mg/d ; escitalopram oxalate , least 40 mg/d.Patients unable tolerate suppose optimal dos also eligible maximally tolerate dose . 1. comorbid Axis I psychiatric disorder 2. drug abuse last 3 month 3 . HAMD > 25 4. severe receive ACT evaluation 5. high risk suicide 6. pregnant prepare pregnancy 7. somatic disorder 8. receive aripiprazole ( ≥10mg 8weeks ) ACT ( 8 time within 2 month ) 9. treat one kind SSRI
